mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tb_inquiry i JOIN (SELECT d.detail_name as detail_name , d.detail_code as detail_code FROM tb_detail_code d WHERE d.group_code='categoryCD') d ON d.detail_code = i.category_cd JOIN (SELECT d.detail_name as detail_name , d.detail_code as detail_code FROM tb_detail_code d WHERE d.group_code='answerCD') d2 ON d2.detail_code = i.answer_cd WHERE i.loginID = #{loginID};

/* 공통코드로 내부직원, 외부직원, 직책 가져오기 */
SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as row_num , d.detail_name as category_name , i.inq_title as inq_title , i.loginID as loginID , i.inq_no as inq_no , DATE_FORMAT( i.inq_regdate, "%Y/%c/%d" ) as inq_regdate , d2.detail_name as answer_name FROM tb_inquiry i JOIN (SELECT d.detail_name as detail_name , d.detail_code as detail_code FROM tb_detail_code d WHERE d.group_code='categoryCD') d ON d.detail_code = i.category_cd JOIN (SELECT d.detail_name as detail_name , d.detail_code as detail_code FROM tb_detail_code d WHERE d.group_code='answerCD') d2 ON d2.detail_code = i.answer_cd WHERE (@rownum:=0)=0 AND i.loginID = #{loginID} ORDER by row_num DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize};

SELECT i.inq_title as inq_title , i.inq_content as inq_content , i.category_cd as category_cd , i.loginID as loginID , a.ans_content as ans_content , a.ans_title as ans_title , i.inq_no as inq_no , i.inq_regdate as inq_regdate FROM tb_inquiry i LEFT JOIN tb_answer a ON i.inq_no = a.inq_no WHERE i.inq_no = #{inq_no};
SELECT d.detail_name as category_name , d.detail_code as detail_code FROM tb_detail_code d WHERE d.group_code = 'categoryCD';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_inquiry( inq_title , inq_content , inq_regdate , inq_moddate , category_cd , answer_cd , loginID ) VALUES ( #{title} , #{inquiry_content} , now() , now() , #{selectCategory} , '0' , #{writer} );
